name: Choti Si Khushi
briefDescription: Choti si Khushi is a community-based, volunteer-driven, registered organization based out of Dwarka, New Delhi. We offer after-school activities and engagements for women and children belonging to urban slums. We have a completely volunteer-driven approach to impart knowledge and skills, counsel the troubled kids, listen to them or just spend time with them, all in a community park.
